tool_input.description: Check for new events after adding Read to the hook matcher
Check the most recent event to see what tool was captured

tool_input.command: tail -10 "/proc/17093/fd/1" 2>/dev/null | grep -E "(Broadcasting|Read|Arsenal)" || echo "No recent Read event broadcasts"
tool_input.description: Check server logs for Read event broadcasting
